bot_greeting_6: PLZ_TRANSLATE Well hello! It's been a long time!
bot_greeting_absent: PLZ_TRANSLATE I'm counting your money. We can talk again tomorrow!
bot_question_connect: PLZ_TRANSLATE You don't have any contacts yet. Do you want to invite some now?
bot_question_allowance: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yay! Today is %1$d and you will get %2$d. Do you want to put the money in your savings?
bot_message_allowance: PLZ_TRANSLATE Woohoo! Today, it's %1$d and you've got a savings bonus of %2$d!
bot_question_goal: PLZ_TRANSLATE I see you haven't set up a savings goal... What do you wish for?
bot_question_share_goal: PLZ_TRANSLATE Well done with the %1$d ! You managed it on %2$d days. Do you want to share it with your friends?
bot_message_list_tasks: PLZ_TRANSLATE Looking forward to making some money now? Then you can perform any of these tasks.
bot_compliment_task: PLZ_TRANSLATE Nice that you completed the task %1$d. I love the photo proof! Good work!
bot_question_profile_pic: PLZ_TRANSLATE You haven't added a profile picture yet. How do you look? Give me a selfie!
bot_compliment_tasks_completed: PLZ_TRANSLATE You're on fire! Wow! You performed all chores this week!
bot_question_latest_task: PLZ_TRANSLATE Have you seen your latest chore, %1$d? It can give you %2$d. Time to get started now?
bot_question_rate_app: PLZ_TRANSLATE What do you like about the app? Can you rate from 1-10?
bot_question_goal_map: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have advanced with your savings goal... Do you want to climb the goal map?
bot_stats_bank: PLZ_TRANSLATE The change in your Savings since last month is %1$d
bot_stats_tasks_profit: PLZ_TRANSLATE %1$d was earned on chores this week, and you have performed %2$d of your chores!
bot_stats_goal_amount_left: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have %1$d left until the next goal!
bot_stats_next_bonus: PLZ_TRANSLATE Next savings bonus comes in %1$d days and is worth %2$d. Here's how it is calculated  %3$d * %4$d = %5$d
bot_stats_next_allowance: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have %1$d in the piggy bank and %2$d in the next weekly rate
bot_stats_next_allowance_days: PLZ_TRANSLATE You will receive your next weekly allowance in %1$d days
bot_stats_compare: PLZ_TRANSLATE Did you know that the money in your Savings is enough for %1$d cheeseburgers, %2$d months on Spotify and %3$d sweaters?
bot_goodbye_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE I have to go and count your money! See you again tomorrow!
